Detailed Description

template<class V, class T>
class Spatial< V, T >

The Spatial class extends the Bound class by adding spatial information.

This is in the form of local (related to parent) information and world information.

Spatial Nodes take advantage of the Trfm class to perform spatial functions. They can be both 2D and 3D, and should therefore use Vec2/Vec3 and Trfm2/Trfm3 as their template parameters. Any other template parameter will cause an error on compilation.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
